mapper.update: update video set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photourl = #{photourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, videourl = #{videourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collectioncount = #{collectioncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, categoryid = #{categoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, photourl, videourl, collectioncount, userid, categoryid, status, createTime from video where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, title, photourl, videourl, collectioncount, userid, categoryid, status, createTime from video
